description: Blue star (Amsonia tabernaemontana ‘Storm Cloud’) has an amazing beauty that stands out in any garden. Its striking blue star shaped flowers bloom in mid-spring, adding a burst of vibrant color to your landscape. The lance-shaped leaves are perfectly arranged in attractive clusters, and change to a beautiful yellow in the fall, creating a stunning seasonal show. The delicate foliage provides an airy backdrop for other more showy plants, while its drought and pest resistance, as well as its tough nature, make it a great addition to any garden. Blue star is truly an amazing plant.
